        public boolean isDayOfWeekLong(java.lang.String expectedDayOfWeek)
        This method checks if statement contains a day of the week which is written in full form
        Parameters:
        statement -
        Returns:
        true if is either of {"monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday", "saturday", "sunday"}; false, otherwise

        public boolean isDayOfWeekShort(java.lang.String expectedDayOfWeek)
        This method checks if statement contains a day of the week written in short
        Parameters:
        statement -
        Returns:
        true if is either of { "mon", "tue", "wed", "thu", "fri", "sat", "sun" } ;false, otherwise

        Returns:
